tabs.title: Introduction
tabs.content:
“You can’t be a player by watching a match. You have to get into the ground”

Krithi is the k! workshop that is held exclusively for school students. The aim of this workshop is to infuse the essence of engineering in budding minds.

This year we are launching a new platform with "electronics" which still remains as a terra incognita for the school students.

Do you imagine switching your lights on or off, play music, close the curtains and control the climate of your room while you relax on your couch? This notion of domestic bliss may once have been purely within the realm of science fiction, but may soon be possible with the rise of intelligent home networking / home automation which entitled as smart homes.

Krithi workshop is expected to take you into a whole new world of engineering and refine your thinking capabilities. You need not be an expert in electronics, but your passion for science is more than enough!

Decide! Commit! Succeed!

tabs.title: Agenda
tabs.content:
Day 1 (20th February, 2016)

Session 1 (8.30 AM – 12.30 PM)

» A Motivational Talk About Engineering

» Explanation of model

Session 2 (1.30 PM – 5.00 PM)

» Hands on - Model building

» Evaluation of model

tabs.title: Rules
tabs.content:
» Eligibility Criterion:

Students from 9th, 10th, 11th and 12th having valid IDs from any recognised school can attend this workshop.

» Pre-requisites:

There are no pre-requisites for the workshop.

» Type of Participation:

Only team participation is allowed. A team can have a maximum of 3 and minimum of 2 members. 

» Payment:

The cost of the workshop is INR 450/- per team and the details of the payment will be mailed to the participants who have been shortlisted.

» Certificate Criterion:

The certificate will be issued to the participant only if he/she attends all the sessions of the workshop. On failing to do so, the registration of the participant will stand for the cancellation and he/she will have to forfeit the fee.

tabs.title: FAQ
tabs.content:
» Will the workshop necessitate any prior knowledge in Electronics?

Not necessarily. We prefer if you come with an open mind for attending this workshop.

» Students from which grade can participate?

Students from 9th, 10th, 11th and 12th can participate.

» Will I be provided with a certificate?

Yes, but we request you to participate for your own benefit and not for a certificate.

» Should I bring any material for this workshop?

You must bring your school ID card.

» Can my team mate be from another school?

Yes, of course.

» Is there appreciations for the best performance?

Of course, best performers will be rewarded.

» Do you provide accommodation?

Yes. The short listed candidates will be provided accommodation based on the availability and nativity. Participants have to separately register and pay for the accommodation. Participants will be notified of the registrations for accommodation.

tabs.title: Fee
tabs.content:
» Payment:

The cost of the workshop is INR 450/- per team. Participants will be redirected to payment page as soon as they register. 
The payment details will also be intimated to the participants through mail.
